title: Blue essence and IP
body:
So i understand that all of our IP will become Blue essence at the start of the preseason.
And we will get Blue essence from the chests.
But will we get Blue essence after a game, like we get IP now?

replies.body: Yup!  You would receive Blue Essence instead of IP after the conversion.

"But will we get Blue essence after a game, like we get IP now?"

NO

You will not earn BE after games the same way you did with IP.
Eventually you will likely be unable to get enough BE for the new champs you want.
Thanks for lying to us! Never buying RP again until this is changed, just so your greedy tactics wont work {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

how much tho? 
do we get for 1 IP  1 Blue Essence ?

Yup more useless blue essence for people like me who own all the champions and already have over 5k blue essence.

I have 15 keys no chests and over 5K blue essence also all the champions and I still get champ shards from chests ( why do I get these if I already own all champs ).

they need to find a better use for this blue essence because people are just going to have it coming out of their ears like I am with nothing to spend it on.

I also heard Runes are going to be free, how true this is I don't know but even if they added that to the blue essence I would still have over 4k left after I bought what I needed.

"But will we get Blue essence after a game, like we get IP now?"

NO

You will not earn BE after games the same way you did with IP.
You will likely be unable to buy the new champs you want for very long.
its almost impossible to get 6300 BE well you may take a week
does anyone know if the blue essence transfer will happen before they new champ comes out. because i dont want to loose all my ip on champ shards, if i still need the ip for the new champ
